description.displayText: Eileen went above and beyond what we could have ever asked of her. She was always on time and easily flexible with schedules. She gave the level of care that a family member would and never took a break. She is always finding something to do on any down time including cleaning and organizing. We will never forget how caring and respectful she was to our family and the great lengths that she went when we needed her the most. She is amazing! Thank you!
